name: Blind Salamander
address: 301 N LBJ Dr Ste 111, San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Blind Salamander Cantina is a colorful and lively margarita and taco joint located in Downtown San Marcos. Margaritas frozen or on the rocks, crispy or soft tacos, breakfast tacos, and of course, just about anything you want smothered in queso - Blind Salamander Cantina is a great place to relax after an afternoon spent exploring Downtown San Marcos.

name: Cats Billiards
address: 143 S. LBJ Dr San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Eight-foot pool tables and free pool with purchase. Juke box, cold beer and good friends.

name: Chances R
address: 138 S L B J Dr, San Marcos, TX 78666
about: We are Chances “R.” The oldest continuous liquor establishment in San Marcos. We started as Hutton’s Key club then the Angnew Club, L.O.’s, and The Restless Wind. It stayed the Restless Wind for fifty years and become Chances “R” in 2013. The current owners have had the Restless Wind – Chances “R” for forty seven years.

name: Cheatham Street Warehouse
address: 119 Cheatham Street San Marcos, TX 78666
about: There are very few music venues that have as much musical reverence and historical charm as Cheatham Street Warehouse. The place where George Strait, Randy Rogers, Stevie Ray Vaughan, Shelley King, John Arthur Martinez, Todd Snider, Slaid Cleaves, Terri Hendrix and many more honed their skills – Cheatham Street Warehouse is a music-lovers paradise.

name: Chimy's Cerveceria
address: 217 E. Hopkins St. San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Just blocks from the river this watering hole is the perfect destination after tubing all day and the ideal place to grab some Tex-Mex and margaritas before you hit the square for a night out with friends! Head on over to Chimy's for a margarita the size of your head and a giant platter of nachos. Or a burger, or tacos, or maybe a chimychanga - whatever is calling your name...

name: Cody's Restaurant Bar & Patio
address: 690 Centerpoint Road #209 San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Cody's provides a relaxing and cozy atmosphere, great music and a fresh full menu with specialty drinks, wine and beer. Relax on the patio and watch the hill country sunset. We take pride in not only the presentation and quality of our cuisine, but also the first-class service that comes along with it.

name: Crafthouse Kitchen And Tap
address: 242 N LBJ Dr, Suite 103 San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Looking for good food, excellent drinks, a great atmosphere and conveniently located in the heart of Downtown San Marcos? Crafthouse is just the spot! Crafthouse has flexible seating from booths, chairs and tables to pub tables with barstools. Our goal is to provide you with the freshest ingredients and we source with local vendors as a top priority.

name: The Davenport
address: 194 S Guadalupe St San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Great tunes, delicious food, tantalizing libations, FUR-BABE friendly with large outdoor patio seating for your “people watching” pleasure! From scotch to bourbon, martinis to cocktails, beer to wine, seasonal menus to "mocktails". We have RAD knowledgeable Staff who help create it all. Come getchyo LOUNGE on!

name: Evo Entertainment At Springtown Center
address: 1180 Thorpe Lane San Marcos, TX 78666
about: A true social hub & entertainment destination, EVO features a six-screen dine-in cinema with all luxury recliner seating and food and drink service right to your seat, eight lanes of boutique bowling, a full-service restaurant, arcade and board games, as well as an innovative craft cocktail bar.

name: Black Rabbit Saloon
address: 127 E. Hopkins St. San Marcos, TX 78666
about: The latest and greatest addition to the San Marcos nightlife scene! Enjoy cold beer on draft, a great selection of bottled beer, or partake in one of our specialty cocktails. Offering San Marcos' only 'big kids' game room, you can roll Skeeball, throw darts, play pool, or be challenged at any of our numerous video games! Come drink, come play.

name: Axis
address: 202 N LBJ Suite A San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Axis is San Marcos' premier underground bar. Located right in downtown San Marcos at the heart of the square we feature karaoke, late night food, live entertainment, piano bar, and private events. Axis also has a courtyard for soaking up the lively San Marcos atmosphere.

name: Zelicks Icehouse
about: Rough 'n' ready roadhouse bar set in a 1930s gas station with TVs, games, a pool table & a patio. In May 2011, Zelicks was opened by brothers' Chase and Seth Katz, as a place that would attract diverse clientele to its friendly atmosphere, making it the perfect place to make new friends or catch up with old ones.
address: 336 W Hopkins St, San Marcos, TX 78666

name: Patio Dolcetto
address: 322 Cheatham St, San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Located in San Marcos and inspired by the beautiful river, Patio Dolcetto embodies the energy and class of the city with the laid back atmosphere of the Hill Country. Treat yourself to great wines, craft ciders, cocktails, martinis, craft beers and good food on the romantic patio. And trust us, you're going to want to save room for dessert! Enjoy dining and imbibing at Patio Dolcetto.

name: Freddy C's Lounge
address: 141 E. Hopkins St San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Welcome to Freddy C’s, a hidden gem nestled in the heart of San Marcos, Texas. Our story is one of community, creativity, and a passion for serving unforgettable moments. Come enjoy your favorite sports on the largest HD screens in town or just sit back and relax as the fast and friendly staff take care of you.

name: Full Moon Saloon
address: 16480 Texas Hwy 123, San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Full Moon Saloon is where to go in San Marcos when you want to unwind and enjoy a drink. They offer a full bar, friendly atmosphere and good service. They have plenty of TVs for those of you who want to enjoy watching your favorite team play, pool tables and dart boards. You'll enjoy the menu of appetizers they offer to go along with whatever your drink of choice may be. There's no need to worry about having to spend a fortune to indulge yourself in the many drinks that are available. The cost of drinks is reasonable, and the quality is superb.

name: Green Parrot
address: 124 N. LBJ Drive San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Green Parrot is a fun place to come and enjoy a good drink with good friends. Historic bar, est. 1982. longest lasting bar on the square... AKA we can handle our liquor.

name: The Growling
address: 700 North LBJ Drive Suite 111 San Marcos, TX 78666
about: There are 27 Texas breweries represented on the tap wall from all five regions of the state. Drink a pint or share a growler with your friends at the bar, or purchase your beer to-go. They also offer plastic growlers for your float down the river or classic glass growlers and fancy porcelain growlers for those special occasions.

name: Happy Cow Bar And Grill
address: 9103 FM1102, New Braunfels, TX 78130
about: Enjoy live music, delicious drinks and tasty food at Happy Cow Bar & Grill. The Texas Hill Country oasis is the perfect place to grab a picnic table, kick back and enjoy a good burger, cold beer and great music. Live music is played on the large outdoor stage, the “Happy Cow Backyard,” every Friday and Saturday.

name: Harper's On The Square
address: 139 E. Hopkins St. San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Whether you're looking to watch the big game, relax with a round of drinks with your friends, or catch a live music performance, Harper's is always a good time.

name: I Don't Know Bar
address: 650 E. Hopkins St San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Pool, darts and lots of TV's with all the sports channels. I Don't Know Bar is open early and closes late. Monday-Friday 1pm-2am Saturday-Sunday 12pm-2am

name: Jack's Roadhouse
address: 1625 Hunter Rd. San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Looking for a place to kick back, relax and enjoy a cold one (or two)? Jack's Roadhouse is just the place! With covered porch seating, live music and a full service bar, you're sure to be in for a good time.

name: Kissing Alley
address: 121 E Hopkins San Marcos, TX 78666
about: What may seem like an average alley to passersby is actually one of San Marcos’ hidden gems! With eclectic murals both large and small, twinkly lights strung overhead and, of course, scenic views of the Hays County Courthouse – Kissing Alley is the heart of Downtown San Marcos.

name: Lanikai Lounge & Tiki Room
address: 700 N LBJ, #113 San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Tiki Culture, Tropical Cocktails and Paradise vibes! LaniKai primarily serves tiki drinks and other classic cocktails. We also serve “small bites” of food with a Hawaiian and Asian fusion.

name: The Marc
address: 120 East San Antonio Street San Marcos, TX 78666
about: With state-of-the-art sound, lighting and production equipment, three full-service bars, an upper-level balcony, a capacity of nearly 1,000 fans, two projector screens that show off the stage and a large dance floor - The Marc is a place you truly have to see and hear to believe!

name: Martindale River Cafe
address: 415 Main St Martindale, TX 78655
about: Beer. Wine. Coffee. Fun. Sammies. Snacks. Music. Gifts. Good friends and good times in magical, mystical, Martindale.

name: Mayloo's
address: 138 N LBJ San Marcos, TX 78666
about: A taste of the countryside in the heart of the city. Mayloo's has a full-service bar in a historic building on the square. Sit outdoors on the deck and enjoy a refreshing beverage.

name: Middleton Brewing
address: 101 Oakwood Loop San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Four legs or two, everyone feels right at home at Middleton Brewing! We suggest getting a glass of anything that strikes your fancy and then head to the rooftop for beautiful Hill Country views. The laid-back atmosphere at Middleton really hits the spot after a long day of exploring.

name: Nephew's
address: 100 N. Guadalupe St. San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Fashionable nightclub with a club atmosphere, great bartenders and some of the best drink specials in Downtown San Marcos. Monday-Saturday 8pm-2am.

name: The Porch
address: 129 East Hopkins Street San Marcos, TX 78666
about: The Porch offers 55 different craft beers and features several televisions, including a 360-degree display at the bar.

name: Putt Pub
address: 307 S LBJ San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Two full bars, indoor and outdoor seating, tasty food trucks, games, and, of course, an 18-hole miniature golf course - Putt Pub is a great place for the kids at heart. This laid-back neighborhood bar is full of fun surprises (like a seesaw!) and you're always in for a good time.

name: Ragnar's On The Compound
address: 6900 Ranch Road 12 San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Ragnar's On The Compound is an indoor bar that is part of The Southern Compound, which is a 6-acre outdoor music venue. Crank the amps up to 11, and get ready to rock! The best sound and light system around on both the outdoor and indoor stages will leave you electrified and wanting more.

name: Railyard Bar And Grill
address: 116 S. Edward Gary St. San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Railyard Bar and Grill is a great place for the whole family to hang out, play and enjoy some good food. Get a drink from the full bar, relax and listen to live music and explore the spacious outdoor area with games for the whole crew.

name: Red Bus Food Truck Park
address: 801 Chestnut St San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Red Bus Food Park is home to the only 40-foot bus that is heated and cooled for dining with food trucks surrounding it. Opt for outside dining under the shade of the trees on the lot. Get a sweet dessert from the bakeshop on site.

name: Riley's Tavern
address: 8894 FM 1102, New Braunfels, TX 78132
about: Did you know that Riley's was the first Texas establishment to get a beer license after prohibition ended in 1933? It's been a go-to watering hole ever since! Enjoy good food, great drinks, and of course, lots of wonderful live music.

name: Roughhouse Brewing
address: 680 Oakwood Loop San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Roughhouse Brewing is a family-owned and operated craft brewery located on five acres of the Pasternak family ranch in the hill country of San Marcos. Tucked away off of Ranch Road 12, the brewery serves refreshing, farmhouse-style beer and scratch-made fare that complements the Texas landscape. Customers can relax inside the rustic brewery barn or in the oak-surrounded outdoor seating area and enjoy live music on the weekends.

name: Saké Bistro & Bar
address: 100 W. Hopkins St San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Saké Bistro Bar offers a versatile setting for whatever mood you’re in. There are screens propped at all angles at the bistro bar and serve many craft beer and saké selections. Our goal is simple: to provide the ultimate experience and a memory for each of our guests every single night!

name: Sean Patrick'S Irish Pub & Texas Grub
address: 202 E. San Antonio St. Ste.119 San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Sean Patrick’s is all about the Irish pub and Texas grub! Grab yourself an order of Guinness Fish & Chips and a cold pint of Sean Patrick’s finest beer and enjoy the buzz of Downtown San Marcos.

name: Shade Rooftop Patio
address: 127 E Hopkins St San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Relax with a cold beverage on the open-air rooftop at Shade Rooftop Patio. Find a shady spot, start a game of Jenga or simply just kick back and unwind with some of the best craft cocktails in town! Open daily: 4pm - 2am

name: Showdown
address: 207 E. Hutchison St. San Marcos, TX 78666
about: For decades, Showdown has been a staple hangout for locals and students alike. The laid-back environment with cheap drinks, good people and plenty to do makes Showdown an ideal bar to call home. Stop by for a drink and find your home at Showdown! Grill Hours: Monday - Saturday: 11am - 1am Sunday: 12pm - 1am

name: The Taproom
address: 129 E. Hopkins St. Suite 120 San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Taproom Pub and Grub opened its door in 1994 with one goal in mind, to serve the best food and beer around, and over 20 years later that is exactly what their customers have come to expect. Whether you are dining on one of their award-winning burgers or the famous baby back ribs, you will be sure to find just the right beer to accompany your meal. So bring your appetite and come enjoy what has kept customers coming back year after year.

name: Treff's Tavern
address: 804 Chestnut St. San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Treff's Tavern, is your friendly neighborhood bar located right up North LBJ and just across from Texas State campus. Treff's Tavern is your one-stop haven whenever you need to get out of the house, take a break from work or school, or just need to get a cold one. Bring your friends, or just come up on your own and meet our great bar staff and regulars! You'll love our daily happy hour and nightly drink specials, as well as get caught up in our weekly events!

name: The Vault
address: 100 W. Hopkins San Marcos, TX 78666
about: The Vault is a popular nightlife spot on the Square in Downtown San Marcos. The name pays homage to when the building was the "Old State Bank" and the vault inside was blown up with nitro by the Newton Gang, waking up the neighborhood. The gang emerged with $24,000 and they simply walked out of town.

name: The Veranda Roof Top Patio
address: 139 E. Hopkins San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Enjoy the best view of Downtown San Marcos at Veranda! 360 degrees views of San Marcos from the top of Harper's Public House.

name: Uproot
address: 215 N LBJ DR San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Nestled above the Root Cellar Cafe and a stone’s throw from the busy Square is UpRoot. It’s the perfect place for a cocktail before dinner, date night out to impress, or a solid start to a legendary evening.

name: Wake The Dead Coffee House
address: 1432 Ranch Road 12 San Marcos, TX 78666
about: This funky Tim Burton-esque serves breakfast and lunch. Choose from a variety of over 55 imported and domestic beers. Monthly exhibits showcase local artists. Monday - Sunday: 7am - 12am

name: Wildfire
address: 141 E. Hopkins St San Marcos, TX 78666
about: Wildfire is a nightclub located in the heart of San Marcos offering a full bar with various local DJs and events.
